org.smooks.delivery

Interface ContentHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AfterVisitor, BeforeVisitor, ChildrenVisitor, ConfigurationExpander, Consumer, ContentHandlerFactory<T>, DOMElementVisitor, DOMSerializerVisitor, DOMVisitAfter, DOMVisitBefore, DOMVisitor, ElementVisitor, ExecutionLifecycleCleanable, ExecutionLifecycleInitializable, InterceptorVisitor, JavaXMLReader, ParameterizedVisitor, Producer, SAXElementVisitor, SaxNgVisitor, SAXVisitAfter, SAXVisitBefore, SAXVisitChildren, SAXVisitor, SerializerVisitor, SmooksXMLReader, VisitLifecycleCleanable, Visitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataSource, AbstractInterceptorVisitor, AbstractOutputStreamResource, CloneResourceConfig, ContextObjectSerializerVisitor, DefaultDOMSerializerVisitor, DefaultSAXElementSerializer, DirectDataSource, DomModelCreator, ElementIndexCounter, EventInterceptor, ExceptionInterceptor, Export, Exports, GhostElementSerializerVisitor, JavaContentHandlerFactory, JndiDataSource, MapToResourceConfigFromAttribute, MapToResourceConfigFromParentConfig, MapToResourceConfigFromText, NestedExecutionVisitor, NewResourceConfig, NullSourceXMLReader, ParameterDecoder, Pause, PropertyListParameterDecoder, RemoveAttribute, RemoveElement, SaxNgSerializerVisitor, SetElementData, SetElementDataConfigDigester, SetOnResourceConfig, StaticProxyInterceptor, SystemSaxNgSerializerVisitor, TerminateVisitor, TerminateVisitor, TextConsumerInterceptor, TextSerializerVisitor, TokenizedStringParameterDecoder, WriterInterceptor, XStreamXMLReader

    @NotThreadSafe
public interface ContentHandler
    Smooks resource and a target of content delivery.
